relation: The Revised Grail Psalms: A Liturgical Psalter
The Revised Grail Psalms: A Liturgical Psalter
The revised Grail Psalms as plain Psalter for recitation. Learn more
The revised Grail Psalms, the singing version. Learn more
textBeforeTable: Available titles A song of praise God, king of the world Psalms for the soul The Grail Psalms The Grail Psalms were first published in 1963. Originally they were translated from the Hebrew for use by the Grail community in their daily prayer. Since then, the original version Grail Psalms has been published in several editions, world-wide. They are also used in Roman Catholic liturgy throughout the English-speaking world. An Inclusive Language version is also available. The Grail Psalms have also been revised to accommodate the 'Liturgiam Authenticam'. For more see Grail Psalms, revised editions. Psalms from the book Message board-->
